_source.short_desc: Ready to take your childcare business to the next level? Go paperless with Sandbox - powerful, award-winning daycare software.
_source.long_desc: Your all-in-one child care platform that is intuitive and easy to use. We provide comprehensive child care management, integrated parent engagement, and powerful business growth tools all in one app. Sandbox is built with educators in mind and has more than 140,000 users across North America. Find out why top-performing centers use Sandbox to handle their day-to-day child care tasks. Get started for free today or connect with a product expert for a free live tour!
_source.pricing_details:
Childcare centers with 0-24 children: $59 per month
Childcare centers with 24-49 children: $79 per month
Childcare centers with 49-99 children: $129 per month
Childcare centers with 100-199 children: $169 per month
Childcare centers with more than 200+ children: $199 per month

*Pay upfront for the year and save 20%!
_source.target_audience: Sandbox serves Child Care Centers, Daycares, Preschools, Afterschool Programs, Enrichment Programs, Montessori Schools, and Camps of all sizes.

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: Calendar Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share multiple calendars

category_features.name: Communications Management
category_features.definition: Record and track all relevant internal and external communications

category_features.name: Daily Reports
category_features.definition: A record of all the events that happened since the previous day. This record is distributed daily.

category_features.name: Employee Management
category_features.definition: Tracks employee schedules, availability, performance

category_features.name: Immunization & Allergy Tracking
category_features.definition: Manage updates to member?s immunization records and track individual allergies

category_features.name: Meal / Nutrition Management
category_features.definition: Meal and snack planning, scheduling and distribution

category_features.name: Member Database
category_features.definition: Add, store and access information pertaining to members

category_features.name: Parent Portal
category_features.definition: Online gateway through which parents can access/update children personal information

category_features.name: Payment Processing
category_features.definition: Accept, record, and reconcile financial transactions

category_features.name: Registration Management
category_features.definition: Make a list of and register attendees for an event

category_features.name: Self Check-in/Check-out
category_features.definition: Manage check-ins and check-outs of books

category_features.name: Wait List Management
category_features.definition: Record and update waitlists if classes or schedules are already full

related_products.short_desc: The #1 child care software: Contactless attendance, ongoing parent communication, digital reports, seamless payments, and more.
related_products.features: GOOD NEWS: If youre looking for the perfect app to run your superstar childcare center, you've found it! HiMama is  the #1 easy-to-use software for savvy child care programs tired of paperwork taking over their centers. HiMama provides an easy way to record and share children's activities, everything from silly and fun moments to learning and development to involve parents and improve outcomes for children. The program also has powerful reporting and staff management features for directors.

related_products.short_desc: Get a free demo and see how easy check-in/out, logging activities in the digital daily sheets, and parent communications can be!
related_products.features: Accelerate your child care business with brightwheel - the #1 platform for early education.  Brightwheel is a management software solution for childcares, daycares, and preschools specifically designed to streamline tasks tackled by directors/administrators and teachers at mid- to high-capacity centers. In addition to saving hours per week of effort for each staff member, 100% of parents are more satisfied with their school experience once brightwheel is implemented.

related_products.short_desc: The comprehensive, easy-to-use childcare management software trusted by the top centers. Designed for center owners, by a center owner.
related_products.features: LifeCubby is the easy-to-use management software trusted by the nations top childcare programs. Whether your center has five students or 500+ students, LifeCubby's unmatched suite of features has what you need to keep your center running smoothly -- at the most affordable price point in the industry. Designed by a center owner, LifeCubby is consistently being updated with innovative offerings -- including individualized lesson-planning options, in-app family messaging and more.

related_products.short_desc: Child care management software enabling contactless check-in/out, integrated tuition collection, business management tools and more.
related_products.features: Procare Solutions is the #1 name in child care management software - used by 35,000+ daycare businesses. For over 30 years, child care professionals have looked to Procare to provide real-time information for making critical decisions, maintaining compliance with local and state regulations, and adhering to business best practices. Feature-rich software, hardware and apps.

related_products.short_desc: Everything you need to manage and grow your child care business from one platform.
related_products.features: The childcare platform to increase enrollment. Increase enrollment, book revenue, get more reviews and retain clients from one platform.

related_products.short_desc: KidKare is a childcare management software that saves you time & money while caring for children. It ensures compliance with the USDA.
related_products.features: KidKare by Minute Menu is a childcare management software that allows you to save time and money while caring for your children. We have spent the last 25 years building a robust CACFP application to streamline the claim process while ensuring compliance with USDA requirements.  In addition to the food program, KidKare offers accounting software to help home childcare providers manage their business.

related_products.short_desc: Build a customized solution to manage your child care and children's activity business, with online forms and payments on your website.
related_products.features: Regpack helps child care facilities and providers to collect registration and payments. We work with child care centers, youth and after-school programs, camps, and more to build a customized solution that works for you. Top features include automated emails, integrated payment processing, recurring payment plans, membership and subscriptions, activity scheduling, waitlists, time conflict management, and custom forms. Manage your families and cash flow effortlessly. Learn more with a free demo.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your center more effectively and efficiently resulting in higher revenue, higher staff retention and improved student safety.
related_products.features: Smartcare is an easy to use child care center management and classroom software solution that has changed the way child care center owners, directors, teachers, and parents connect. Easy billing and payment processing; attendance, record keeping, and prospect family tracking are all included. Our user-friendly software does the hard work for you while you focus on what matters most: the children!  Smartcare serves centers with 20+ children, multi-site centers and shared services agencies.

related_products.short_desc: Simple activity management tools built by parents for educators. Billing, scheduling, parent communications, and more, made easy!
related_products.features: Sawyer is an all-in-one software that allows educators to build custom schedules and easily manage online registration, payment processing, parent communications and more. We support all types of schedules - full and half-day camps, semesters, drop-ins, private lessons and more. Our dedicated, top-rated support team provides training videos, webinars, and business resources to bring our community together. Our software is flexibly priced to suit your business and requires no long term contracts.

related_products.short_desc: A cloud-based child care center software to improve communication with parents and manage classrooms.
related_products.features:
Daily Connect is an app used by thousands of childcare centers around the world to better manage parent relationships, streamline operations, and stay compliant. 

We provide childcare center directors a suite of parent communication tools, contactless sign-in and attendance tracking, and other tools to manage your childcare center smoothly, all from one easy to use app.

We offer a free 14 day trial so you can see if we're a good fit, and low prices starting from $8.99/mo.

related_products.short_desc: EZCare software includes fee management, parent engagement, scheduling, and attendance tracking
related_products.features: EZCare makes enrollment, billing, and scheduling easy. Extensive customization of fields, screens, and user permissions, means EZCare works the way you do, and multi-site functionality lets you work across all your sites at one time. EZCare comes with online registration, parent-portal with contactless payments and Check-In, and EZSmiles family engagement app. With 35+ years of childcare experience and the industry-leading support team, EZCare is the #1 choice for preschool & school-age programs

similar_products.features: The all-in-one enrollment, billing, payments, and child care management software that keeps you rockin' and enrollin'. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top School Administration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of School Administration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: School Administration software automates the administrative functions of schools including student information, admissions and records for school administrators, office managers, accountants and registrars. School Administration applications manage all school information via a single interface, including: student, family and staff data, courses and classes and faculty data. They provide integration for admissions, enrollment and class scheduling and also perform billing and tuition management functions. School Administration software is related to Classroom Management software, Gradebook software and School Accounting software.

related_products.short_desc: Easy-to-use software to help your school save time, improve enrollment and fulfill its mission.
related_products.features: Administrators, help your school save time, improve enrollment and fulfill its mission. Attendance, communication tools, lesson plans, reporting, Google Classroom Integration, and more -- all in one integrated platform that's easy to use. Gradelink is entirely internet-based so you and your staff can work anywhere, making it ideal for bolstering distance learning. Plus you'll enjoy personalized training and support at no additional charge.

related_products.short_desc: Manage class scheduling and registration, billing and payments, communications, and reporting all from one convenient software online.
related_products.features: Developed by school owners, for school owners, iClassPro is the worlds best online class management software solution for class-based businesses. A subscription to iClassPro includes features for class and camp schedule, enrollment tracking, communications, accounts receivable, online registration, reporting and more. iClassPro has an amazing support team is available to help every step of the way.

related_products.short_desc: Schoology, a PowerSchool company, is the education technology company putting collaboration at the heart of the learning experience.
related_products.features: Schoology seamlessly connects learning management with assessments so that school districts can improve student performance, foster collaboration throughout their community, and personalize learning for every student. Every day millions of students, parents, faculty and administrators from nearly 2,000 K-12 school districts leverage Schoology to advance what is possible in education.

related_products.short_desc: Alma's mission is to help create the greatest generation of educators so that they can create the greatest generation of students.
related_products.features:
Alma's future-proof student information system tools optimize K-12 school operations, empowering educators to improve family engagement and student outcomes. From daily processes to community-wide communication and state reporting, Alma's solutions enhance educational best practices. Our mission is to help create the greatest generation of educators so that they can create the greatest generation of students.

Empower progress. Spark potential.

related_products.short_desc: Web-based gradebook and school management system for individual teachers, schools, and districts.
related_products.features: An affordable, easy-to-use, web-based gradebook and school management system offering a wide array of features for individual teachers, schools and districts.  Features include student, class, and grade management, attendance and behavior tracking, custom report generation, and extensive student and parent communication features. Individual web portal accounts for students and parents are included with all subscriptions at no additional cost.

related_products.short_desc: Built by and for children's activity providers, Sawyer is class management software for online scheduling, online payments, and more.
related_products.features: Sawyer is an all-in-one software that allows providers of after school activities to build custom after school programs and easily manage online registration, payment processing, parent communications and more. Our dedicated and top-rated support team provides training videos, hosted webinars, and business resources for educational leaders to bring our community together. Our software is flexibly priced to suit your business and requires no long term contracts.

related_products.short_desc: BrainCert goes beyond course delivery with true collaborative learning and comes with over 300+ premium features.
related_products.features:
BrainCert's all-in-one unified training platform comes integrated with built-in Student Information System (SIS), blended courses, adaptive testing, virtual classroom, content management system and more. 

Create multiple schools with multiple-language support. Integrate with over 3000+ apps. Supports RTL languages such as Arabic and Hebrew.

related_products.short_desc: School management software providing parents online access to their student's grades, homework assignments, attendance and activities.
related_products.features:
MSP is a powerful all-in-one School Information Management System (SIS). MSP saves your
school, faculty and parents time by consolidating critical processes into one cloud-based platform. MSPs roots were founded (and have been trusted by) some of the largest and most prestigious Pk-12 Private, Independent & Charter Schools across the United States for over 8+ years. We provide everything to seamlessly operate a School from enrollment to emergency communications and everything between!

related_products.short_desc: Tuition Express automates tuition collection for child care, enabling contactless payments- EFT, online or completely automated.
related_products.features: Tuition Express by Procare is the easiest and safest child care billing software, making tuition collection seamless for child care providers. Tuition Express, a PCI compliant direct processor, gives you all of the contactless payment options you need - electronic fund transfer (EFT), online or completely automated. With low fees, numerous payment options and live customer support, Tuition Express is the child care industry's most used and recommended integrated payment processing system.

related_products.short_desc: Your centralized hub for teaching & learning. Say goodbye to siloed tools with curriculum, instruction, and assessment all in one place
related_products.features: The Kiddom education platform places everything schools and districts need for teaching and learning in one place. Say goodbye to siloed tools with curriculum, instruction, and assessment all in one place! Align curriculum with student performance data for the first time, and receive real-time early warnings.

related_products.short_desc: We empower schools to simplify dismissal, engage parents, and keep students safe with one, easy to use platform.
related_products.features: Pikmykid is the leading safety and dismissal platform that empowers schools to simplify dismissal, engage parents, and keep students safe without the need to purchase, install, or support additional hardware. Designed by former educators and parents, Pikmykid has helped more than 2,000 schools in all 50 states eliminate the busy work and vulnerabilities of dismissal so that teachers have more time to teach, admins aren't bogged down in carpool calls, and principals can account for every student.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Admissions software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Admissions tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Admissions software is used to manage student applications and automate enrollment processes for schools and universities. These solutions can also be used for managing admissions to membership-based programs, grants, and fellowships. Admissions software helps manage student records, streamlines communication between applicants and the admitting organization, and enables tracking of prospects generated through school or university marketing campaigns.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Classroom Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Classroom Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Classroom Management software creates, manages, and assesses class lesson plans and school curriculums for primary and secondary public or private schools. Teachers use these applications to create tests and lesson plans, manage attendance, enable online collaboration, monitor student activities, and manage documents via a convenient, integrated online interface. Classroom Management solutions allow easy contact from student to teacher, teacher to principal and principal to district school administration. Classroom Management software is related to Gradebook software and School Administration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Gradebook software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Gradebook tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Gradebook software automates grade tracking, performance assessment and monitoring of student attendance and provides easy access to synchronized data for teachers, principals and school administrators. Education professionals use Gradebook applications to aid in the development and evaluation of lesson plans and student assignments. They also provide features for assessing student performance along with integrated demographic data and state and federal guidelines. Gradebook software is related to Classroom Management software and School Administration software.

related_categories.description: School Accounting software automates accounting, financial operations and other back office functions for educational institutions. These applications are specifically designed for the budgetary needs of school management and typically include tools for: accounting, billing, accounts payable, purchasing and payroll into a single administrative tool. School Accounting software is related to School Administration software.

pricing_plans.name: Basic
pricing_plans.description: The pricing is according to the number of children and increases as the number of children increase. The plan also offers an 20% discount on annual billing, going up to $159 per month for 200+ children.
